short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The first SocialFi 2.0 built on Injective, by Ninjas & for Ninjas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
xNinja Extension that helps users follow the journey of five elemental ninjas to farm $ELEM token.

- Training ninjas directly on ùïè platform (formerly Twitter), hunting chests daily when interacting with tweets on your feed to receive $ELEM token, ninja food, and many other valuable items.
- Storing information on the blockchain and using Web3 technology to purchase items and pets through smart contracts.
- Become one of the first OGs on Injective, and contributed significantly to Injective's growth and success.
